metadata.dc:author: Maticorena-Quevedo, Jesús
Anduaga-Beramendi, Alexander
Beas, Renato
metadata.dc:title: Síndrome de burnout en estudiantes de medicina de México: consideraciones sobre la medición con el Maslach Burnout Inventory.
Burnout syndrome among medical students in Mexico: considerations about its measurement with the Maslach Burnout Inventory.
